title: Ratio of Loans and Discount to Net Deposits, National Banks for United States
notes:
Monthly Coverage Varies From Year To Year. Except For 1874, Which Only Has Data For October And December, All Years Have Scattered Five Month Coverage. See Original Series For Makeup Of Loans And Discounts. Net Deposits Were Taken Directly From Source. Data Are Subject To Reserve Requirment. Source: Computed By NBER From Data In Annual Reports Of The Comptroller Of The Currency.

This NBER data series m14047 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 14 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter14.html.

NBER Indicator: m14047
